Text.Page:
The argons employ mechanical war machines against us, but their power supply lies safely in the Argon Catacombs.

If we'd only moved a bit faster, we could've destroyed the {@LinkCreature:418#2009#cyasma catalyzer}."Send me."
That's no blue milk run, <PCNAME>, but if you're up to it, report to {@LinkCreature:418#2003#Arigma} in the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}. He'll point you in the right direction.

Sure, you could destroy the {@LinkCreature:418#2009#cyasma catalyzer}, but it won't be easy. Also, there's three of them.

You're welcome to try, I just want you to understand what you're facing. The argons keep a force of bore troops ready to protect the catalyzers.

If the ground starts a-rockin', you start a-runnin'.

We heard, er, felt the explosion! Fine work taking out the catalyzer!

I'll get couriers back to Khanovar Citadel and let them know the argons are vulnerable for a little while.
